Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção

Examples: internal\observability\telemetry.go:13:2: SA1019: "go.opentelemetry.io/otel/exporters/jaeger" is deprecated: This module is no longer supported. OpenTelemetry dropped support for Jaeger exporter in July 2023. Jaeger officially accepts and recommends using OTLP. Use [go.opentelemetry.io/otel/exporters/otlp/otlptrace/otlptracehttp] or [go.opentelemetry.io/otel/exporters/otlp/otlptrace/otlptracegrpc] instead. (staticcheck)
